channel.title: Masters Cast
channel.description: The first He-Man and She-Ra podcast. Join your hosts Jon "TheShadow", Katy "Rainbow Brite", "Wacky" Martin, and James "Busta Toons" Eatock as they delve into the worlds of Masters of the Universe and Princess of Power. www.MastersCast.com

item.title: Masters Cast - Episode 028
item.description:
Hosts: Jon Kallis, Katy Cartee, Martin Penny
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com
Episode 28
Please join Jon, Martin, James, and special guest Alex Hawkey as we review the final She-Ra Princess of Power DVD release: Season Two! Not only is Alex one of the biggest and most knowledgable She-Ra fans around, he also had the opportunity to work on the She-Ra DVDs themselves. We had a little bit of an audio echo at times during the podcast, I do apologize. Subscribe to our podcast for free via iTunes:
Subscribe for free via iTunes
item.author: admin@masterscast.com (Jon Kallis)
item.itunes:author: Jon Kallis, Martin Penny, James Eatock, Alex Hawkey
item.itunes:subtitle: DVD Review: She-Ra Season 2
item.itunes:summary:
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com Jon Kallis, Martin Penny, James Eatock, Alex Hawkey Episode 28
Please join Jon, Martin, James, and special guest Alex Hawkey as we review the final She-Ra Princess of Power DVD release: Season Two! Not only is Alex one of the biggest and most knowledgable She-Ra fans around, he also had the opportunity to work on the She-Ra DVDs themselves. We had a little bit of an audio echo at times during the podcast, I do apologize.

item.title: Masters Cast - Episode 027
item.description:
Hosts: Jon Kallis, Katy Cartee, Martin Penny
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com
Episode 27
THE LOST EPISODE! Masters Cast is the first He-Man and She-Ra podcast. We talk Masters of the Universe and Princess of Power until we drop dead from excitement! Masters Cast is back with a special treat! From deep within our vaults we have retrieved a lost episode! Join Jon, Katy, and Martin as they discuss the New Adventures of He-Man toyline. Be careful though, Jon and Martin are ready to do battle with the electronic Skeletor skull staff! Subscribe to our podcast for free via iTunes:
Subscribe for free via iTunes
item.author: admin@masterscast.com (Jon Kallis)

item.itunes:subtitle: The Lost Episode
item.itunes:summary:

The LOST EPISODE!
Masters Cast is the first He-Man and She-Ra podcast. We talk Masters of the Universe and Princess of Power until we drop dead from excitement!
Masters Cast is back with a special treat! From deep within our vaults we have retrieved a lost episode! Join Jon, Katy, and Martin as they discuss the New Adventures of He-Man toyline. Be careful though, Jon and Martin are ready to do battle with the electronic Skeletor skull staff!

item.title: Masters Cast - Episode 023
item.description:
Hosts: Jon Kallis, Josh de Lioncourt, Katy Cartee
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com
Episode 23
She-Ra Season One Volume One DVD Review

This episode focuses on the She-Ra Princess of Power: Season One Volume One DVD that hits stores Tuesday, November 7, 2006 and contains the first 32 episodes of She-Ra, brand new box art, two new art cards, the She-Ra series bible, a documentary feature, and two commentary tracks that feature the likes of Larry DiTillio and J. Michael Strazynski. To join us on our review and analysis of the DVD itself and the episodes contained within is special guest co-host James "Busta Toons" Eatock who not only worked on the DVDs but is our own He-Man and She-Ra Google. In celebration of the release of She-Ra, and our one year anniversary, Masters Cast is having a giveaway. Go to http://www.masterscast.com/giveaway to enter to win a free copy of the She-Ra Season One Volume One DVD and a Masters Cast: Podcast of Power T-Shirt!
Running time: 1:18:53 Subscribe to our podcast for free via iTunes:
Subscribe for free via iTunes
item.author: admin@masterscast.com (Jon Kallis)
item.itunes:author: Jon Kallis, Josh de Lioncourt, Katy Cartee
item.itunes:subtitle: DVD Review: She-Ra Season 1 Vol. 1 - Special co-host James "Busta Toons" Eatock
item.itunes:summary:
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com Jon Kallis, Katy Cartee, James Eatock Episode 23 She-Ra Season One Volume One DVD Review
This episode focuses on the She-Ra Princess of Power: Season One Volume One DVD that hits stores Tuesday, November 7, 2006 and contains the first 32 episodes of She-Ra, brand new box art, two new art cards, the She-Ra series bible, a documentary feature, and two commentary tracks that feature the likes of Larry DiTillio and J. Michael Strazynski.
To join us on our review and analysis of the DVD itself and the episodes contained within is special guest co-host James "Busta Toons" Eatock who not only worked on the DVDs but is our own He-Man and She-Ra Google.
In celebration of the release of She-Ra, and our one year anniversary, Masters Cast is having a giveaway. Go to http://www.masterscast.com/giveaway to enter to win a free copy of the She-Ra Season One Volume One DVD and a Masters Cast: Podcast of Power T-Shirt!
Running time: 1:18:53

item.itunes:author: Jon Kallis, Josh de Lioncourt, Katy Cartee
item.itunes:subtitle: Parallels between He-Man and She-Ra
item.itunes:summary:
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com Episode 022 for Sunday, October 22 2006
Hosts: Jon Kallis, Josh de Lioncourt, Katy Cartee
Happy Anniversary to Masters Cast - the first He-Man and She-Ra Podcast! We have been “on the air” for one year! Josh, Katy, and I want to extend our thanks to everyone who has supported us.
Episode 22 goes back to our old-school roots by looking in to the parallels between He-Man and She-Ra. Both series have a similiar foundation, yet seem to explore the same ideas in many different ways.
We also received a lot of voice mails! Listen today to see if your message made it on the show! Want to leave us a voice mail? Click on the Submit Your Voice link at the top of the page.

item.title: Masters Cast - Episode 019
item.description:
Hosts: Jon Kallis, Josh de Lioncourt, Katy Cartee
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com
Episode 019 for Sunday, July 30, 2006

Masters Cast traveled to the International Comic Con 2006 in sunny San Diego last week. BCI Eclipse was there to promote the all new best of She-Ra DVD release and Masters Cast was right in the middle of the action. Our special edition podcast this week contains a recap of all of the happenings of SDCC 2006. While on the floor, we scored interviews with James "Busta Toons" Eatock, Val Staples, and Eamon O'Donoghue who all are working on some aspect of He-Man and She-Ra DVD releases. In addition, we also were able to interview key players who actually worked on the cartoons of He-Man and She-Ra! Continue listening to find interviews with Larry DiTillio, Erika Scheimer, and the one-and-only, Lou Scheimer. Running time: 0:35:48 Bonus! You can also experience our interview with Lou and Erika Scheimer in video format! Check us out at the BCI/Tower Booth (QuickTime required). Subscribe to our podcast for free via iTunes:
Running time: 0:35:48

Subscribe for free via iTunes
item.author: admin@masterscast.com (Jon Kallis)
item.itunes:author: Jon Kallis, Josh de Lioncourt, Katy Cartee
item.itunes:subtitle: San Diego Comic Con 2006 SDCC
item.itunes:summary:
Masters Cast www.MastersCast.com Episode 019 for Sunday, July 30 2006
Hosts: Jon Kallis, Josh de Lioncourt, Katy Cartee
Masters Cast traveled to the International Comic Con 2006 in sunny San Diego last week. BCI Eclipse was there to promote the all new best of She-Ra DVD release and Masters Cast was right in the middle of the action.
Our special edition podcast this week contains a recap of all of the happenings of SDCC 2006. While on the floor, we scored interviews with James "Busta Toons" Eatock, Val Staples, and Eamon O'Donoghue who all are working on some aspect of He-Man and She-Ra DVD releases. In addition, we also were able to interview key players who actually worked on the cartoons of He-Man and She-Ra! Continue listening to find interviews with Larry DiTillio, Erika Scheimer, and the one-and-only, Lou Scheimer.
Bonus! You can also experience our interview with Lou and Erika Scheimer in video format! http://www.masterscast.com/video/mcsdcc2006.mov

item.title: Masters Cast - Episode 018
item.description:

Disclaimer This site and podcasts are not endorsed by Mattel Toys or Entertainment Rights, the parent owners of He-Man and She-Ra. These podcasts are intended for entertainment and information purposes only and are non-profit.
